content: I'm glad you mentioned the Louvre Museum and the Mona Lisa. I actually visited the Louvre during my trip to Paris last month, and I was amazed by the museum's collection. The Mona Lisa was indeed smaller than I expected, but the overall experience was incredible. I'm excited to explore Rome's art museums and compare them to the Louvre. Can you tell me more about the Galleria Borghese and its collection?
